articles.title: A tangled web of deals stokes AI bubble fears in Silicon Valley - BBC
articles.description: Some are worried that the rapid rise in the value of AI tech companies may be a bubble waiting to burst.
articles.content:

articles.author: Ali Salman
articles.title: Vivo Blatantly Copies iOS 26’s Liquid Glass Redesign, Bringing Apple’s Controversial Aesthetic Straight to OriginOS 6 - Wccftech
articles.description: Vivo’s OriginOS 6 update mirrors Apple’s iOS 26 Liquid Glass design, adopting its frosted panels, rounded icons, and animated wallpapers.
articles.content: Vivos latest OriginOS 6 platform looks like it was designed by someone who had iOS 26 open on the next screen. From the rounded icons and frosted overlays to the glass-like dock and depth-shifting wa… [+2720 chars]
